synopsis.text:
No sooner does Kōmei set foot in the prestigious St. Francesca Academy as a transfer student, than she finds herself embroiled in a fierce competition for the coveted position of Student Council President. With factions of four students battling it out in various school athletic events, the stakes are high and the competition is intense.

Kōmei's first day at the academy starts off on the wrong foot when she arrives late and collides with the well-endowed Kan'u. However, the two quickly become friends, much to the chagrin of the fiery Rin Rin. As Kōmei, Kan'u, Chouun, and their friends settle into their new school lives, they find themselves thrust into a series of ecchi-filled, boobalicious challenges that test their strength, agility, and teamwork.

When Kan'u asks Kōmei to join her team and help her win the contest, Kōmei finds herself in the middle of a high-stakes battle for power and influence. With two-legged races and numerous other challenges ahead, will Kōmei and her team emerge victorious, or will they be left in the dust by their rivals? And more importantly, will any of the girls manage to keep their clothes on in the process? Only time will tell in this thrilling and titillating OVA of Koihime Musou set in a school environment.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
